items.name: Accident Detect
items.subtitle: Our AI-powered Accident Detection System instantly identifies traffic collisions using real-time video analysis, enabling rapid emergency response and enhancing urban safety through immediate alerts.

items.name: Infrastructure
items.subtitle: Our AI-driven Infrastructure Management System monitors road conditions in real-time, detecting issues like potholes and hazards, and notifying maintenance teams for immediate action.

items.name: Crime
items.subtitle: Our Crime Detection System uses AI to analyze live video feeds, identifying suspicious activities and alerting law enforcement instantly, enhancing urban security and crime prevention.

items.name: Traffic flow
items.subtitle: The AI-based Traffic Control System optimizes urban traffic flow by analyzing real-time data, detecting congestion, and adjusting signals to improve road efficiency and reduce delays.
